entry.title: US MMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T
entry.summary: THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 15, 21:00 PST - Nov 16, 04:00 PST Nov 15, 05:21 PST Scheduled - The AT&T network in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 15 November 2022 at 21:00 PST until 16 November 2022 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

entry.title: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T
entry.summary: THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 15, 20:00 PST - Nov 16, 05:00 PST Oct 28, 19:33 PDT Scheduled - The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 November 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 16 November 2022 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

entry.title: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2
entry.summary: Nov 15, 16:00 PST Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Nov 15, 12:01 PST In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Nov 13, 11:46 PST Scheduled - The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 15 November 2022 at 12:00 PST until 15 November 2022 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

entry.title: WhatsApp Messaging Scheduled Maintenance
entry.summary: Nov 15, 16:00 PST Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Nov 9, 00:00 PST In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Nov 7, 12:33 PST Scheduled - Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance beginning 09 Nov 2022 at 00:00 PDT until 15 Nov 2022 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, WhatsApp senders may each experience downtimes of up to 15 minutes, which can result in delayed deliveries for WhatsApp messages sent to/from these senders during this brief period.

entry.title: 500 Errors When Logging to Flex
entry.summary: Nov 15, 14:03 PST Resolved - The Flex user interface is operating normally at this time. Nov 15, 13:32 PST Update - The Flex user interface is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 13:04 PST Monitoring - The Flex user interface is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 12:37 PST Identified - We have identified a rate limit issue within a Flex dependency and are manually scaling up to mitigate the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 12:04 PST Update - We are currently investigating an elevated rate of 500 errors when logging into the Flex Interface. Customers may not be able to log in into Flex. Our engineers are working on the issue and we will provide another update within 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 11:56 PST Investigating - We've become aware of a potential issue with the Flex user interface not loading. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

entry.title: SMS and MMS Delivery Delays to Toll-Free Numbers
entry.summary: Nov 15, 11:38 PST Resolved - We are no longer experiencing SMS and MMS delivery delays when sending messages to Toll-Free numbers. This incident has been resolved. Nov 15, 11:25 PST Update - We are observing recovery in SMS and MMS delivery delays when sending messages to Toll-Free numbers. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update within 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 10:56 PST Monitoring - We are observing recovery in SMS and MMS delivery delays when sending messages to Toll-Free numbers. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update within 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 10:00 PST Update - We are continuing to investigate SMS and MMS delivery delays when sending messages to Toll-Free numbers. Our engineers are working on a resolution. We will provide another update within 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 09:00 PST Update - We are continuing to investigate SMS and MMS delivery delays when sending messages to Toll-Free numbers. Our engineers are working on a resolution. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 08:32 PST Update - We are experiencing SMS and MMS delivery delays when sending messages to Toll-Free numbers. Our engineers are working on a resolution. We will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 08:18 PST Investigating - Our monitoring system has detected a potential issue with Toll-Free delays. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

entry.title: SMS Delivery Delays to Beeline Network in Armenia
entry.summary: Nov 15, 11:29 PST Resolved - We are no longer experiencing SMS Delivery Delays to Beeline Network in Armenia. This incident has been resolved. Nov 15, 08:12 PST Update - We are still experiencing SMS Delivery Delays to Beeline Network in Armenia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve this issue. We will provide another update within 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 07:11 PST Investigating - We are experiencing SMS Delivery Delays to Beeline Network in Armenia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. entry.title: Outbound Call Failures to Twilio Norwegian Phone Numbers
entry.summary: Nov 15, 08:57 PST Resolved - The issue affecting outbound call failures to Twilio Norwegian phone numbers has been resolved and the service is functioning normally at this time. Nov 15, 07:08 PST Monitoring - We have started seeing recovery for outbound call failures to Twilio Norwegian phone numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update within 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 06:11 PST Update - We are observing outbound call failures to Twilio Norwegian phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 15, 05:45 PST Investigating - Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue impacting calls made to Norwegian phone numbers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide another update within the next 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

entry.title: Incident: Some users are unable to post messages
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On November 14th at 9:46 AM PST to 1:31 PM PST, a planned code change for workspaces on the Free plan resulted in some users seeing the error message "Slack couldn't send this message" when trying to send messages.
We have reverted this code change for further review and refinement.

entry.title: Uploading Images
entry.summary: Nov 14, 17:40 PST Resolved - Issue uploading images has been resolved. Nov 14, 17:27 PST Monitoring - A fix has been implemented, so users should be able to upload images again. Engineering is continuing to investigate the root cause of issue. Nov 14, 17:25 PST Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue. Nov 14, 17:13 PST Investigating - We are currently experiencing issues with uploading images, so users may experience slow loading times or upload failures. Engineering is investigating the root cause of this issue.

entry.title: Degraded service in Rippling
entry.summary: Nov 15, 00:01 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Nov 14, 22:59 UTC Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. Nov 14, 22:56 UTC Identified - We've identified the issue and deploying a fix. Users may be having issues using various features and services inside of the Rippling app.

entry.title: 500 When Getting Reservations
entry.summary: Nov 10, 14:08 PST Resolved - The incident has been resolved Nov 10, 09:19 PST Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. The get Reservations endpoint was recovered at 8:55 AM PDT. Nov 10, 09:16 PST Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue. Nov 10, 07:52 PST Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue related to increased error rate on the reservation endpoints. The increase started around 7:05 AM PDT. We'll post updates as we have more information.

entry.title: Scheduled infrastructure maintenance
entry.summary: Nov 4, 06:05 CET Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Nov 4, 05:00 CET In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Nov 2, 12:39 CET Scheduled - Please note there is scheduled infrastructure maintenance on Friday 4th of November, between 5 AM and 7 AM CET, when you can expect a few short service interruptions. During this maintenance following services will be affected: - Migrations will not be available - Shared hooks created within maintenance will not be accepted nor processed - Logins to the platform might be affected - Registration of new subscribers won't be possible - Invitations of new team members won't be possible - E-mails and notifications might be delayed - Password reset won't be possible - Payments for subscription plans won't be accepted We will inform you once the maintenance is completed.

entry.title: GitHub Importer Maintenance
entry.summary: Nov 4, 04:01 UTC Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Nov 4, 03:00 UTC In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Oct 27, 17:00 UTC Scheduled - GitHub Importer—namely the “Import repository” (https://github.com/new/import) UI on GitHub.com and the "Source Imports" (https://docs.github.com/en/rest/migrations/source-imports) REST API—will be undergoing scheduled maintenance. During this time, no new source imports will be processed. You will not be able to start new source imports until the end of the maintenance window.

We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one. Nov 3, 16:10 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded availability for Actions.

entry.title: Incident: Users having trouble creating a workflow in Workflow Builder
entry.summary:
Issue Summary:
On Wednesday, November 2nd at 2:12 PM PST to 4:34 PM PST, some users were running into issues with publishing a workflow when using Workflow Builder. Clicking the “Next” button would not return any response, and would cause a workflow to remain in its unpublished state. A new code change had been deployed that caused us to exit early in workflow creation and this is now fixed.

entry.title: Issues loading Rippling
entry.summary: Nov 2, 13:02 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Nov 2, 13:01 UTC Update - We are continuing to monitor for issues. Nov 2, 12:52 UTC Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. Nov 2, 12:45 UTC Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

entry.title: Incident with Issues and Pull Requests
entry.summary: Nov 1, 21:25 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Nov 1, 20:25 UTC Update - We continue to investigate the cause of incorrect results on issue and pull requests search pages. Nov 1, 19:48 UTC Update - We are investigating reports of incorrect results on issue and pull requests search pages. Nov 1, 19:46 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Issues and Pull Requests.

entry.title: Incident: For an emoji sent as a standalone message, the emoji code is not displayed on hover
entry.summary:
Issue Summary:
On Wednesday, October 26th at 2:15 PM PST Friday to October 28th 9:12 PM PST, some users were unable to view emoji/code previews when hovering their cursor over messages containing emojis. Upon investigation, we discovered that an error had occurred with the jumbomoji (a message with just an emoji) previewer during the process of a backend code-change we were performing related to emoji. Once we learned this, we were able to deploy a fix which rectified this issue for all affected users.

entry.title: Incident: Some users may be experiencing issues sending messages, loading threads, and saving bookmarks
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On October 28, 2022 from about 1:06 PM PDT to 1:17 PM PDT, some customers experienced trouble loading threads, sending messages, and saving bookmarks.
This issue occurred when we deployed a web app change resulting in an increased database load. We have since rolled back the deploy, restoring functionality for all affected users.

entry.title: Emergency Infrastructure Upgrade on EU1
entry.summary: Oct 28, 06:29 CEST Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Oct 28, 05:00 CEST In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Oct 27, 12:57 CEST Scheduled - Please note that there will be an emergency infrastructure maintenance on 28th of October, between 5 AM and 7 AM CEST on EU1 Instance . During the maintenance some scenarios processed at that time might be temporarily delayed . We do not expect any data loss. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

entry.summary: Oct 27, 16:00 UTC Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Oct 27, 15:00 UTC In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Oct 20, 16:54 UTC Scheduled - GitHub Importer—namely the “Import repository” (https://github.com/new/import) UI on GitHub.com and the "Source Imports" (https://docs.github.com/en/rest/migrations/source-imports) REST API—will be undergoing scheduled maintenance. During this time, no new source imports will be processed. You will not be able to start new source imports until the end of the maintenance window.

Oct 27, 06:08 UTC Update - We have identified a potential fix for the issue where users were experiencing unresponsive code blob views. Oct 27, 04:59 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Pull Requests.

entry.title: Delayed processing of the scenarios and scenario history unavailability
entry.summary: Oct 26, 18:10 CEST Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 26, 17:20 CEST Identified - Please note we are currently investigating the issue of delayed scenario processing and scenario history being unavailable at the moment.

entry.title: Incident with Issues
entry.summary: Oct 26, 14:40 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 26, 14:07 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Issues.

entry.title: Scheduled infrastructure maintenance
entry.summary: Oct 26, 07:00 CEST Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Oct 26, 05:00 CEST In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Oct 18, 15:33 CEST Scheduled - Please note there is scheduled infrastructure maintenance on Wednesday 26th of October, between 5 AM and 6 AM CEST, when you can expect few short service interruptions. During this maintenance following services will be affected: - Migrations will not be available - Shared hooks created within maintenance will not be accepted nor processed - Logins to platform might be affected - Registration of new subscribers won't be possible - Invitations of new team members won't be possible - E-mails and notifications might be delayed - Password reset won't be possible - Payments for subscription plans won't be accepted We will inform you once the maintenance is completed.

entry.title: 500 Error Across All APIs
entry.summary: Oct 24, 10:27 PDT Resolved - This incident has been resolved. The increase in 500 errors occurred between 4:00 a.m. and 7:00 a.m. PDT. Please reach out to us via the Support Portal if you are still experiencing 500 errors. Oct 24, 05:40 PDT Investigating - We are having a site wide issue causing 500 errors across all APIs. We are currently investigating, and we will post updates as we have more information.

entry.title: Incident with Git Operations
entry.summary: Oct 21, 23:59 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 21, 23:40 UTC Update - We are investigating reports of issues with service(s): Git Operations. We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation. Oct 21, 23:06 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Git Operations.

entry.title: Requests to create room amenity photos failing (Listing Photos POST Request)
entry.summary: Oct 21, 16:03 PDT Resolved - We have identified an issue with creating room amenity photos. The issue would cause POST requests to fail with either a 404 error or a 500 error. This issue approximately started from last Friday, October 14th, 2022. The photo creations are successful in most cases but the requests fail at a later stage resulting in error responses. We have fixed this issue at 3:30pm PT today, but there can be duplicate photos created for room amenities during this time. We advise you to review room amenity photos and use the DELETE endpoint to remove duplicate photos. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

entry.title: Rippling Devices application is not loading some pages
entry.summary: Oct 21, 22:34 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 21, 19:45 UTC Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues. Oct 21, 19:44 UTC Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. Oct 21, 15:32 UTC Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix has been deployed, we anticipate that pages will be restored soon.

entry.title: High latency performing certain operations
entry.summary: Oct 21, 11:31 PDT Resolved - We have resolved the issue. All import, export and duplication work as expected. Oct 21, 09:39 PDT Identified - We have implemented a partial fix to unblock key functions, and users should see significant improvement in import, export, and duplication times. We continue to work toward full resolution. Oct 21, 08:21 PDT Investigating - Some customers may be experiencing high latency when attempting to export or import content, or duplicate blocks or pages. We are investigating.

entry.title: Incident with API Requests
entry.summary: Oct 19, 20:23 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 19, 19:52 UTC Update - Issues related to out-of-date notifications have been resolved. Oct 19, 19:35 UTC Update - A small percentage of requests to the audit log APIs are failing. We are continuing to apply additional mitigations. Oct 19, 19:28 UTC Update - We are resolving an issue related to out-of-date notifications on GitHub.com. We will provide further updates as we continue resolving the issue. Oct 19, 18:50 UTC Update - We are investigating an issue with failing audit log API requests. We are actively working on mitigations. Oct 19, 17:45 UTC Update - We are investigating an issue related to the audit logs API Oct 19, 17:39 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for API Requests.

entry.title: Incident: Some users are having issues searching in Slack, seeing the "Something went wrong" message.
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On October 19, 2022, from 8:17 AM to 10:13 PM PDT, some users saw a "Something went wrong" error when attempting a search query.
This issue was caused by a recent code change that resulted in searches failing.
We reverted this change, which fixed the issue for all users after a reload of Slack.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.summary: Oct 18, 16:16 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 18, 16:05 UTC Update - Actions is experiencing capacity constraints with hosted ubuntu-22, leading to high wait times. Other hosted labels and self-hosted runners are not impacted. We are actively working on mitigations. Oct 18, 15:53 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.
